FinScript
Table of Contents

Namespace FinScript.Rendering.ChartObjects

Classes

Base2PointsShapeChartObject

Base class of the shape with 2 points to define

BaseLineChartObject

Draws text with relative screen coordinates, defined in range [0..1]

BaseShapeChartObject

Base class for chart object, that is a shape

BaseTextChartObject

Base class for chart object, that can draw text in the specified area of the chart

BitmapChartObject

Bitmap chart object with relative screen coordinates, defined in range [0..1]

ChartObject

A base type for drawing chart element (IChartElement)

DiamondChartObject

A Diamond chart object, defined by two (Time, Value) diagonal points

EllipseChartObject

An ellipse chart object defined by two (Time, Value) diagonal points

HorizontalLineChartObject

Draws text with relative screen coordinates, defined in range [0..1]

LabelChartObject

Draws text with relative screen coordinates, defined in range [0..1]

LineChartObject

A free line segment defined by two points: begin and end

PointChartObject

A point-like chart object, defined by a single (Time, Value) coordinate There are several standard figures (PointType) available. Also, you can set the custom figure by using SetCustomShape(Point[])

RectangleChartObject

A rectangle chart object defined by two (Time, Value) diagonal points

TextChartObject

Standard text object, defined by a single (Time, Value) coordinate

TriangleChartObject

A Triangle chart object defined by 3 (Time, Value) points

VerticalLineChartObject

A Vertical chart object, defined by Time coordinate
